mapper.select: SELECT p.promotion_id, p.promotion_type_id, pt.promotion_type_name, p.promotion_title, p.promotion_content, p.promotion_start_date, p.promotion_end_date, p.promotion_status FROM promotion p LEFT JOIN promotion_type pt ON p.promotion_type_id = pt.promotion_type_id WHERE promotion_id = #{promotionId}

SELECT p.promotion_id as promotionId, p.promotion_type_id as promotionTypeId, pt.promotion_type_name as promotionTypeName, p.promotion_title as promotionTitle, p.promotion_start_date as promotionStartDate, p.promotion_end_date as promotionEndDate, p.promotion_status as promotionStatus FROM promotion p LEFT JOIN promotion_type pt ON p.promotion_type_id = pt.promotion_type_id WHERE 1 = 1
and promotion_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{promotionTitle}, '%')
and promotion_start_date >= #{startDate}
and promotion_start_date <= #{endDate}
and
promotion_status = 'BEFORE'
promotion_status = 'ONGOING'
promotion_status = 'ENDED'
promotion_status IN ('BEFORE', 'ONGOING', 'ENDED')
ORDER BY
promotion_start_date
promotion_end_date
promotion_title
ASC
DESC
ASC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{count}
